name: BUGGED (Frogrammer, Bibiki)
description:
You are a parasite, take control over enemies and dive deep into their minds. 

Made in 48 hours, LD48 Jam.

Theme: Deeper and Deeper

- CONTROLS -

WASD - MOVE

LMB - SHOOT

RMB - INFECT/EXIT

- TEAM -

@Frogrammer - Code, Level Design

@jamie_noware - Art, Design
